{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21257v1", "title": "On the uniqueness of the quasi-geostrophic equation with the fractional
  Laplacian", "summary": "We consider the uniqueness of the solution of the surface quasi-geostrophic
equation with fractional Laplacian. We show that the uniqueness holds in
non-homogeneous Besov spaces without any additional assumption which is
supposed to constract solutions. When the power of the fractional Laplacian is
close to 2, we prove that the uniqueness with the regularity index $s=-1/2$. We
extract the least regularity $s=-1/2$ for the well-definedness of the nonlinear
term of the equation.", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-30T02:12:20Z"}
